pr_title: Provide submission summary when tapping a submission on the form map

timeline.message: Fixed bug - open read_only form only for review

timeline.bodyText: I think it's best avoid iconColor and go for Material Theme attributes like colorOnSurface or colorOnPrimary. These let us account for the fact that in some color schemes the icon color would differ depending on where it was rendered.

timeline.message: Show bottom sheet after clicking on a marker
Display date and status in one row like we do in lists of instances
Fixed bug - open read_only form only for review
Added displeying the summary dialog for encrypted and deleted forms ans well to keep consistency
Dismiss dialog after opening a form
Code improvements in order to use FormMapViewModel in InstanceSummaryDialogFragment
Code improvements - use just instanceId in InstanceSummaryDialogFragment to build it

timeline.bodyText: It doesn't make sense to have both onFeatureClicked and showSummary since they have the same parameters and showSummary is only called from here. I'd keep onFeatureClicked and move the code here but you could also rename it to showSummary if you think that's clearer.
timeline.author: lognaturel

timeline.bodyText: This is much better and I guess that if truly only necessary data is being saved continuing to use onSaveInstanceState is not so bad.
timeline.author: lognaturel

timeline.bodyText: Doing a sequential search here could be slow if there are lots of instances. I might have considered saving the database id to make this lookup fast. It's probably not that important to do now but wanted to flag it for future consideration.
